member.name: P:StudentManagementSystem.Person.Name
member.summary: Gets and set Name for the person

member.name: P:StudentManagementSystem.Person.Email
member.summary: Gets and set Email for the person

member.name: P:StudentManagementSystem.Person.Age
member.summary: Gets and set Age for the person

member.name: P:StudentManagementSystem.Student.StudentId
member.summary: Gets and set the StudentID, this is unique for all student instance

member.name: M:StudentManagementSystem.Student.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Student class.
member.remarks: Preconditions: The name, age, email, department and universityName parameters must be provided and should be a string. Postconditions: A new instance of the Student class is created with the specified properties.

member.name: M:StudentManagementSystem.Student.Study(System.String)
member.summary: Student study a course The name of the course the student wants to study
member.remarks: Preconditions: The course parameter must be provided and should be a string. Postconditions: A void method that prints the student is studying the specified course.

member.name: M:StudentManagementSystem.Student.TakeTest(System.String)
member.summary: Student take a test The name of the course the student wants to take test
member.remarks: Preconditions: The course parameter must be provided and should be a string. Postconditions: A void method that prints the student is taking test for the specified course.

member.name: M:StudentManagementSystem.Student.SubmitAssignment(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Student submit assignment The name of the course the student wants to submit assignment The name of the assignment the student wants to submit
member.remarks: Preconditions: The course and assignment parameters must be provided and should be a string. Postconditions: A void method that prints the student is submitting assignment for the specified course.

member.name: M:StudentManagementSystem.Student.AttendClass(System.String)
member.summary: Student attend class The name of the course the student wants to attend class
member.remarks: Preconditions: The course parameter must be provided and should be a string. Postconditions: A void method that prints the student is attending class for the specified course.

member.name: M:StudentManagementSystem.Student.JoinStudentClub(System.String)
member.summary: Student join student club The name of the club the student wants to join
member.remarks: Preconditions: The club parameter must be provided and should be a string. Postconditions: A void method that prints the student is joining the specified club.
